entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 7:28 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:28 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
